DOC.brief_title: Sleep Quality Risk Intubation Intensive Care Units Patients With Hypoxemic Acute Respiratory Failure
DOC.criteria: Acute respiratory failure hypoxemia PaO2/FiO2 ratio < 300 mmHg age 18 year Need immediate intubation Need vasopressor drug coma Glasgow scale < 8 Acute respiratory failure link cardiogenic pulmonary oedema Chronic respiratory insufficiency Peripheral central nervous system pathology Known psychiatric pathology agitation Patient decision intubation Patient refusal Pregnant breastfeed woman Patient legal guardianship protection Patients health insurance coverage
